scripts.clean: rm -r src/schemas dist coverage dist-tools dist-test schemas utils build 2> /dev/null; rm *.d.ts 2> /dev/null; rm *.js 2> /dev/null
scripts.buildForNpm: npm run addVersion && npm run generateSchemas; npm run compileTs && npm run arrangeForNpm
scripts.buildForBrowser: npm run addVersion && npm run generateSchemas; npm run compileTs && webpack --config ./config/webpack.config.dev.js && webpack --config ./config/webpack.config.prod.js
scripts.startExampleServer: npm run buildForBrowser && cp ./build/* ./example-server/app/dist && node example-server/app/index.js
scripts.test: npm run clean 2> /dev/null; npm run build:test && nyc --reporter=text --reporter=lcov mocha -r jsdom-global/register --exit 'dist-test/test/**/*.test.js'
scripts.prepublishOnly: npm test && npm run clean 2> /dev/null; npm run buildForNpm
